attributes.action: Cancel internal mock examinations for A level students
attributes.additional_details: Because of Covid we have missed out on almost all of the exam preparation/mock exams we would have usually had. The last internal mock exams I have taken were in January. We have missed so much in school teaching time already why should we miss even more by just coming into school for exams.
attributes.background: For internal mock examinations to not be considered as part of our teacher assessed grades

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Whether to use mock examinations to inform teacher-assessed grades is an operational decision for individual schools.

You might like to sign the following petition:

Don’t allow the use of externally-set exams for 2021 grades
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569280
